name: Rolling With
description:
Welcome to Rolling With. A game about effort, where you roll the dice with me and our very own stick figure, Sisyphus.

A gentle game.

Features:

  • A dice
  • A dice that is rolling
  • Me
  • Sisyphus
  • You

And: 

  • Audio
  • 5% Chance Secret Audio

With:

  • My Heart/Soul
